queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum topicname={{topicname}} | sum by TopicName
_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=PublishSize Statistic=Average topicname={{topicname}} | avg by TopicName
_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=NumberOfNotificationsDelivered Statistic=Sum topicname={{topicname}} | sum by TopicName
_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=NumberOfNotificationsFailed Statistic=Sum topicname={{topicname}} | sum by TopicName

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Success"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by sourceIPAddress, eventName
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = sourceIPAddress
| sort _count

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Failure"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by sourceIPAddress, eventName
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = sourceIPAddress
| sort _count
_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=NumberOfMessagesPublished Statistic=Sum topicname={{topicname}} Region=*

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userAgent" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "requestParameters.topicArn" as topicArn nodrop | json "requestParameters.name" as name nodrop | json "requestID" nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Success"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by eventName
| sort by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "errorMessage" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Failure"

| count as eventCount by eventName

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudwatch/metrics Namespace=AWS/SNS metric=PublishSize Statistic=Average topicname={{topicname}} Region=*

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as userName nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by user
| top 10 user by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" as region nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus 
| timeslice 1h
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, eventName
| transpose row _timeslice column eventName

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Failure"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by errorCode 
| top 10 errorCode by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, eventStatus
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values ("Success", "Failure") in eventStatus
| transpose row _timeslice column eventStatus

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "errorMessage" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Failure"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by eventName
| sort by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "errorMessage" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Failure"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, eventName, errorCode, errorMessage, awsRegion, sourceIPAddress, accountId, user, type
| sort by _timeslice

| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userAgent" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "requestParameters.topicArn" as topicArn nodrop | json "requestParameters.name" as name nodrop | json "requestID" nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userAgent" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "requestParameters.topicArn" as topicArn nodrop | json "requestParameters.name" as name nodrop | json "requestID" nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and eventStatus="Success"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, eventName, awsRegion, sourceIPAddress, accountId, user, type, requestId, name, topicArn, userAgent
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as userName nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as eventCount by user
| top 10 user by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.type" as type nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as userName nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| timeslice 1d
| count as eventCount by user, eventName
| transpose row user column eventName

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\"" topicArn
| json "eventName" nodrop | json "eventSource" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "errorMessage" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop | json "requestParameters.topicArn" as topicArn1 nodrop | json "responseElements.topicArn" as topicArn2 nodrop
| if (!isEmpty(topicArn1), topicArn1, topicArn2) as topicArn
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com" and !isEmpty(topicArn)
| parse field=topicArn "arn:aws:sns:*:*:*" as topicRegion, topicAccountId, topicName
| count as eventCount by topicName
| top 10 topicName by eventCount

_sourceCategory = aws/observability/cloudtrail/logs "\"eventsource\":\"sns.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventSource" nodrop | json "eventName" nodrop | json "awsRegion" nodrop | json "sourceIPAddress" nodrop | json "errorCode" nodrop | json "userIdentity.accountId" as accountId nodrop | json "userIdentity.arn" as arn nodrop | parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | json "userIdentity.userName" as username nodrop 
| where eventSource="sns.amazonaws.com"
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (isEmpty(errorCode), "Success", "Failure") as eventStatus 
| timeslice 1h
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, eventName
| transpose row _timeslice column eventName
